post.title: Alex the Great
post.content: My brother sent me this great compliation video of Alexander Ovechkin’s first year in the NHL. In the words of Barry Melrose, the Calder Trophy has been a one man race for some time now. Congrats to Alex on being only the second rookie to score 50 goals and 100 points his first season.
